original_text: See, for that the Lord hath given you the sabbath, therefore he giveth you on the sixth day the bread of two days; abide ye every man in his place, let no man go out of his place on the seventh day.
korean_text: 볼지어다 여호와가 너희에게 안식일을 줌으로 여섯째 날에는 이틀 양식을 너희에게 주는 것이니 너희는 각기 처소에 있고 일곱째 날에는 아무도 그의 처소에서 나오지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: for that the Lord hath given you the sabbath
therefore he giveth you on the sixth day
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그는 여섯째 날에 너희에게 주신다

sentences.original_text: abide ye every man in his place
let no man go out of his place
